description: The National American Insurance Company (NAICO) Scholarship is open to a full-time student who has declared Insurance & Risk Management as a major or minor and meets the following eligibility requirements: Eligibility Requirements Completed application and official transcript Declared Insurance & Risk Management major or minor Minimum 3.0 cumulative GPA Must have completed 30 hours Must be U.S. Citizen Resident of Oklahoma

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
